title: Emerging investigator series: The gas phase ozonolysis and secondary OH production of cashmeran, a musk compound from fragrant volatile chemical products
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00452C, Paper
Ayomide Akande, Nadine Borduas-Dedekind
Fragrant personal care products are a subset of volatile chemical products (VCPs), an emerging source of outdoor pollutants capable of impacting air quality. Fragrant molecules, such as musks, are used...
